sentences.sentence: I get a lot of enjoyment from music.
sentences.translation: 我从音乐中获得很多乐趣。

sentences.sentence: I get a lot of enjoyment from my grandchildren.
sentences.translation: 我从孙子孙女们那儿得到很多乐趣。

sentences.sentence: Children seem to have lost their enjoyment in reading.
sentences.translation: 孩子们似乎已失去阅读的乐趣。
